code: @Before public void setUpAction() {     new RestExplainAction(Settings.EMPTY, controller()). }

public void testTypeInPath() {     RestRequest deprecatedRequest = new FakeRestRequest.Builder(xContentRegistry()).withMethod(RestRequest.Method.GET).withPath("/some_index/some_type/some_id/_explain").build().     dispatchRequest(deprecatedRequest).     assertWarnings(RestExplainAction.TYPES_DEPRECATION_MESSAGE).     RestRequest validRequest = new FakeRestRequest.Builder(xContentRegistry()).withMethod(RestRequest.Method.GET).withPath("/some_index/_explain/some_id").build().     dispatchRequest(validRequest). }
